description: This file provides mock implementations for RFC parameter handling functions, acting as a test framework component for mocking RFC-related behavior.

classes.name: RfcMock
classes.description: Mock class responsible for simulating RFC parameter interactions during testing.

methods.name: WDMP_STATUS getRFCParameter(const char * arg1,const char * arg2,RFC_ParamData_t * arg3)
methods.description: Calls the mock's getRFCParameter method to simulate retrieval of an RFC parameter.

methods.name: WDMP_STATUS setRFCParameter(const char * arg1,const char * arg2,const char * arg3,DATA_TYPE arg4)
methods.description: Calls the mock's setRFCParameter method to simulate setting an RFC parameter.

methods.name: const char * getRFCErrorString(WDMP_STATUS arg1)
methods.description: Returns a string describing the RFC error status.

ctags.name: getRFCParameter
ctags.pattern: /^WDMP_STATUS getRFCParameter(const char* arg1, const char* arg2, RFC_ParamData_t* arg3)$/

ctags.name: setRFCParameter
ctags.pattern: /^WDMP_STATUS setRFCParameter(const char* arg1, const char* arg2, const char* arg3, DATA_TYPE arg4/
ctags.signature: (const char * arg1,const char * arg2,const char * arg3,DATA_TYPE arg4)
